name: Pakko on Ice
description:
Pakko on Ice

Pakko on Ice is a classic one-screen arcade game I made during this past Midsummer weekend as part of my own game jam.

The Game

In this game you play as Pakko, the loveable baby yeti, as he stumbles upon a frozen lake littered with baby penguins who are lost!

Pakko decides to take it upon himself to save the baby penguins and bring them back home by sliding across the ice, something he absolutely loves to do!

Watch out! Pakko needs to recover after making him slide and the ice breaks the more you touch it, make sure to not fall in.

Controls

No controller support!

The game is PC only and for one player using the mouse. Simply aim and hold Left Mouse Button to move Pakko in that direction.
